name: 3D Cube Rush
description:
The game is based on traditional tower defence game, monsters ball will follow the road from Entry Cube Blue to Exit Cube Green, the player will allow spend a limited amount of money £1000 to purchase different types of turret, to prevent enemy from escaping, failing to escape more than 1 will fail. 

Compare to traditional tower defence game, bc i build that as 3D model, so the map looks much more pretty and the player can set the weapon in some unbelievable position.  

in addition to this, there will be three different level of weapon which label different price, they all allow to upgraded when they player spend some money on that, of course, they are allowed to tear down. 

Inspirations / why you were drawn to make this?

The reason that i try to produce this 3D tower defence game is i was really interested at strategy & tower game, but sometimes i feel stress to spend a lot of time on  traditional defence game, so i would like  to create a short and simple game to save game length . also, a 3D game makes the tower and scene looks really attractive.

NOTE: Game begins immediately. Prepare yourself! Aim with your mouse, left click to purchase your turret and put that on the bricks. That's it!

This game project is produce by  author kwu001. 

Trailer For Everyone
